ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] all I can say is hmmmm
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Give it time, Kitasi.  Give it time. Yes, I can see the benefit of this.  Especially for ebayers.  But I also see a trend developing, and soon we re going
ygData.messageBody:
At 10:20 AM 7/9/2001 -0600, you wrote:
>Well, this is a bit different Talies. Imagine you are a live together
>couple that have parted ways, now you can actually keep your character when
>you split.


Give it time, Kitasi. Give it time.

Yes, I can see the benefit of this. Especially for ebayers. But I also
see a trend developing, and soon we're going to see subscription-only
zones, and subscription-based events, and "platinum-only" items...

Oh - wait, we already have seen a few of those last ones...

*sighs*

Why do I look for fair in fantasy when there's no fair in reality?

Talies the Wanderer
